name: Rearick Winbush
text: I eat in this spot a lot since I work close by. I got to say the customer service is always fantastic and they keep the spot clean at all times. Pricing is convenient and they serve generous portions.

text: We love going out. Last night we arrived in this magnificent restaurant which friends recommended to us. We warmly recommend.
